p: The temperature and RH transmitter was calibrated. The temperature sensing element was calibrated by the TC-2000 temperature calibrator (Instutek AS, Scan-Sense AS, Bekkeveien 163, N-3173 Vear, Norway) and the humidity sensing element was calibrated by several saturated salt solutions. The detail method included the saturated salts that were used, solution volume to air volume ratio and the stable of the temperature were according to the requirement of Organization Internationale De Metrologie Legale (OMIL) [ 23].
